overview: The mountain's foothill became the living observant of Waldo's daughter, Ligaya. She was nurtured and raised as a lovely and an innocent lass. Until one day, a rich and good-looking lad from Manila visited the mountainside and found an abode place in their vicinity. Gilbert was captured by Ligaya's naive and chaste heart and fell in-love with her. But her father forbids their relationship and does everything to dump their love apart.
title: Paraiso Sa Gubat
